title: Goodbye, Thunderbird!
content:
I've been using TB for years and years but this is the end. It was originally a nice alternative to Outlook Express with a small footprint but now it's decided that half my client list is spam. I have literally lost business because emails keep going into spam despite me marking them over and over and over as "not junk".

this is absolute BULLSHIT.
creator: threenorns

title: Disapearing emails
content: I have been using Thunderbird for years. Now all of a sudden in my inbox there is nothing showing. yet there are emails indicated that i have not read. On my other devices I am getting all my emails. My subfolders appear just like always just my Inbox. Crazy. PLEASE help as i dont want to lose all my emails in the subfolders.
creator: clint.smith1

title: Zebra Striping - Add back into Thunderbird Please
content: The new version took away zebra striping. Please bring it back as an option. I know many people that it was much easier to look through large amounts of mail. Please update if this will be added back in. Thank you.
creator: tony263

title: How to get rid of the > sign and curved arrow in inbox pane?
content: I am running TB 115.8 on two separate Macs. On one Mac the inbox does not show the curved arrow and > sign along the left margin while the other does. I want to eliminate it on the Mac that shows them. How do I do it?
creator: jp49c5mbs7

title: using TB for my Gmail acct
content:
nd used TB the entire time - actually used TB longer than that because I started back in Houston

Anyway, stuck with Gmail at this point but I canNOT get TB to work with my Gmail.

ANY help will be MUCH appreciated because, simply put - I freakin' HATE Gmail's interface.

Whenever I try to log in to my TB stuff, I get...

400. That’s an error.

The server cannot process the request because it is malformed. It should not be retried. That’s all we know.
creator: hav
